titulo: Experiencia Viva: Juan (Dramatizada) [NVI The Bible Experience Alive: John]
descripcion:
Enjoy John heard through the voices of servants, worshipers, pastors, and Bible teachers whose ministries and actions have blessed the Spanish-speaking church of the Lord. Experience the beauty, drama, tenderness, and transforming power of the Scripture in a way that you have never heard before. This historic audio production includes the voices of more than 50 of our most esteemed and well-known Hispanic Christian leaders. 
Please note: This audiobook was in Spanish.
